law.catch_line: Notice of employee's rejection to be preserved.

text.section: All notices of rejection of the provisions of this chapter by employees shall, when executed, be preserved by the employer during the continuation of the employment of those employees whose names are subscribed thereto.
No person shall with fraudulent intent, willfully destroy, convert or secrete any such notice, or willfully deprive the owner or his agent thereof, or erase or obliterate any part thereof.

law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4958.
